titleStmt.title: The rib restored, or, The honour of marriage a sermon preached in Dionis-Back Church, occasioned by a wedding the 5 day of June, 1655 / by Richard Meggott.
titleStmt.author: Meggott, Richard, d. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Nath. Webb and Will. Grantham ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
